---
title: "Welcome to the Court"
---

The best way to understand how you might use Data Dunkers in your classroom is to first experience it like a student. In this section, you’ll step into their shoes — exploring activities, solving challenges, and seeing how data comes alive through sports.

To guide you through this part of the course, you’ll have a **Virtual Coach**. This coach will help you navigate the activities, offer prompts and tips, and keep you moving forward.
